data.text:
From struggle to stardom with RCB: Heady story of accidental leg-spinner Asha Sobhana

Asha Sobhana's journey from being selected to the district women's cricket team to signing an RCB contract and impressing with her five-wicket haul in the Women's Premier League showcases her passion, dedication, and talent in the sport. Asha said the RCB contract came to her at the right time as she was toying with the idea of quitting the game because of no recognition even after toiling in domestic cricket for well over a decade.

25 Feb, 2024, 08:33 PM IST

Comic book on K-pop group BTS charts their rise to stardom and military service

The glossy comic sheds light on how these pop stars evolved into international sensations and the unique journey they navigate from being celebrated musicians to fulfilling their military service obligations.

05 Jan, 2024, 08:43 PM IST

Public sector companies ride Aatmanirbhar wave to D-Street stardom

​​The share of govt-owned companies in India’s total market capitalisation rose to nearly 10% in November from a low of 5% in 2020. The market value of PSUs in the BSE 200 index touched a 12-year high of $272 billion (Rs 22.6 lakh crore) at the end of September.

22 Dec, 2023, 09:05 AM IST

From K-Drama Stardom to Hollywood Marvel: How 'Itaewon Class' landed Park Seo Joon a role in the Marvel universe

You may have heard that Park Seo Joon, the renowned K-Drama actor, is poised to make his Hollywood debut in the highly-anticipated 'The Marvels.' He's ready to establish himself on the global stage by portraying Prince Yan in the upcoming Marvel Cinematic Universe film. While his role in the teaser hasn't been fully revealed yet, there's substantial excitement surrounding his involvement.

06 Nov, 2023, 05:39 PM IST

Britney Spears's memoir is a cautionary tale about the dangers of child stardom

​Like many before her, including Judy Garland and Michael Jackson, Spears was ushered into the dangerous terrain of childhood fame by the adults who were supposed to be protecting her, and was utterly unprepared to deal with the fallout.

28 Oct, 2023, 07:00 PM IST

From soccer school to stardom, how Sir Bobby Charlton shaped David ​Beckham's career

Sir Bobby Charlton, one of England's greatest football players and a key member of the 1966 World Cup-winning team, had a significant impact on the sport. He established his own soccer school in 1976, which helped nurture young talent, including David Beckham. Beckham credited Charlton's recommendation to Manchester United as the moment that shaped his career. Despite stepping away from the school in recent years, Charlton's legacy lives on, reflecting his dedication to football and developing the next generation of players.

22 Oct, 2023, 09:15 PM IST

‘The Kashmir Files’ director Vivek Agnihotri slams Shah Rukh Khan & Karan Johar for making ‘PR, hype & stardom’ prevalent in Bollywood

Agnihotri is busy with his new film ‘The Vaccine War’. Starring Nana Patekar, the movie will hit the big screens on 28th September

‘He used to be late all the time’: Bollywood veteran Prem Chopra reveals why Rajesh Khanna couldn’t sustain his stardom

Both the superstars (Bachchan and Khanna) were seen in two Bollywood classics- ‘Anand’ (1971) and ‘Namak Haraam’ (1973).

According to Netflix, the six-episode original series is the network's trending number one show in India and ranks number three for non-English TV shows globally.

Cooking up stardom: Meet the chefs elevating touring cuisine for Beyoncé, Lizzo

Behind the scenes of Beyoncé and Lizzo's world tours: Meet the talented chefs nourishing the stars. From lavish desserts to vegan feasts, these culinary professionals play a crucial role in keeping the artists and their entourage well-fed and energized on the road.

23 Jul, 2023, 11:24 AM IST

Apple TV+ announces French drama based on thrilling story of celebrity chef Antonin Careme

Apple TV+ is set to release a French drama series titled 'Careme'. The show depicts the story of the world's first celebrity chef Antonin Careme, who grew in Paris to rise in the culinary world under Napoleon's Europe.
